local_intent: Ensure bin is visible, detect the lid, move above it by 5 cm and align precisely; verify pose readiness for lid opening.
assumptions: Frame 2 shows the robot approaching the green bin; the lid is the immediate target.
IsAt(bin_lid) is used as a proxy to verify being above/aligned for the subsequent open action.
coherence_with_global: Follows the global plan up to the approach phase: visibility/scan → DetectObject(bin_lid) → MoveAbove(offset_z=0.05) → ApproachAndAlign(tolerance=0.01); stops before OpenGripper and OpenContainer.
